statements: DELETE FROM payment_transactions WHERE sender_address = 'Alice' AND amount > 100.00;
DELETE FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM payment_history WHERE settlement_amount > 1000 AND settlement_status='pending';
DELETE FROM payment_methods WHERE method_name = 'Credit Card';

DELETE FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND currency = 'USD';
